description: This file contains a mock implementation for Message Bus initialization, used in testing components of the CCSP (Common Component Software Platform). It defines external references, includes headers, and provides an implementation of the CCSP_Message_Bus_Init function that interacts with a mock object.

methods.name: int CCSP_Message_Bus_Init(char * component_id,char * config_file,void ** bus_handle,CCSP_MESSAGE_BUS_MALLOC mallocfc,CCSP_MESSAGE_BUS_FREE freefc)
methods.description: Initializes the CCSP message bus using a mock object, primarily for testing purposes.
